Text.Page:
Thanks for participating in the Claw & Order event!

You've just earned the Junior Detective title by exchanging police Medallions for a Police Report! Collect more medallions to earn more titles:

- 10 Police Reports: Senior Detective
- 50 Police Reports: Ace Detective!Event Dates

The Claw & Order event runs from (day), (date) until maintenance on (day), (date).

Earn Police Medallions from in-game activities until the end of the event, and exchange them for Police Reports until maintenance on (day), (date).

After maintenance, you'll receive a Police Report: Case Closed book containing the collected Claw & Order story as seen on the official TERA forums. Police Medallions?
Police Medallions can be exchanged for items in the Claw & Order shop. Right-click a medallion to open the shop.<NEXTPAGEBUTTON>Anything else I should know?</NEXTPAGEBUTTON>

Log in every day during the event to collect clues, each of which relates to the Claw & Order videos on our #youTube channel. Share your thoughts about the clues in our forums, and on social media with $H_W_GOOD#Claw&Order$COLOR_END.
